thread.title: FIFA confirms Issa Hayatou will take over as acting president
thread.title_full: FIFA confirms Issa Hayatou will take over as acting president

title: FIFA confirms Issa Hayatou will take over as acting president
text:
15:10 CET FIFA confirms Issa Hayatou will take over as acting president Issa Hayatou 
CAF president Issa Hayatou has been installed interim FIFA boss following the 90-day suspension of Sepp Blatter. 
Blatter was found guilty after Swiss attorney general, Michael Lauber, opened a criminal investigation into allegations he mis-sold a World Cup TV rights contract to the disgraced former Fifa official Jack Warner in 2006 and made a 'disloyal payment' of Â£1.3m to Platini in 2011. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
